title: make.bash tries to install something
body:
by **konrad.meyer**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. clone fresh hg release 2010-05-04
2. ./make.bash
3.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
Success even if the current user cannot write to $GOROOT. Instead, the
build fails because make.bash calls 'gomake install' in crypto/rsa for some
reason. This is a regression from 2010-04-27.


What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
linux, amd64, not relevant.


Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
17ded5ad443b release.2010-05-04/release

Please provide any additional information below.
